snippet: A winner of an online contest was disqualified for using a Web site where people who enter digital sweepstakes ask members to vote for them.
abstract: Theodore A Scott, winner of online contest sponsored by Coca-Cola tea brand Gold Peak Tea, is disqualified for using a Web site where people who enter crowdsourced digital sweepstakes ask members to vote for them; Gold Peak is just the latest company to try to create excitement for its brand on social media only to find that sentiment can quickly turn.
lead_paragraph: A winner of an online contest was disqualified for using a Web site where people who enter digital sweepstakes ask members to vote for them.

headline.seo: Contest Winner Loses Prize for Using Web Forum
headline.main: Winner Uses Contest Site and Loses Grand Prize
headline.print_headline: Winner Uses Contest Site And Loses Grand Prize
